Note: Requires Spotify premium account.

plugins.details: The plugin adds Radio Paradise as a music service. It offers streams with different quality, including a lossless Flac option.

plugins.name: volumio-phishin
plugins.description: A Phish.in plugin for Volumio2. Play over 1,500 live Phish audience recordings from Phish.in..  Phish.in and the Volumio Phish.in music service plugin complies with Phish's official taping policy as described at http://phish.com/#/faq/taping-guidelines.
plugins.details: A Phish.in plugin for Volumio2. Play over 1,500 live Phish audience recordings from Phish.in. Phish.in and the Volumio Phish.in music service plugin complies with Phish's official taping policy as described at http://phish.com/#/faq/taping-guidelines.
plugins.author: Noah McGee (lostmyshape)

plugins.name: onedrive_music_library
plugins.description: Allows to play music stored on Onedrive cloud storage service. Note that this is a beta version with limited functionality. Most prominently this version does not yet support adding music files to playlists or queue.
plugins.author: Elmar Jansen

plugins.name: pandora
plugins.description: A plugin to access Pandora Web Radio

categories.name: miscellanea
categories.description: Things that cannot go in other categories

plugins.name: touch_display
plugins.description: The plugin enables the touch display controller for the original Raspberry 7" touchscreen.
plugins.details: Using this plugin is not recommended with Raspberry PI B+! Suggested, Raspberry PI 3, Odroid C1 or C2
plugins.author: Volumio Team

plugins.name: allo_relay_volume_attenuator
plugins.description: This plugin enables Allo's Relay Volume Attenuator
plugins.details: This plugin allows to change Volume trough Allo Relay Attenuator board, which ensures bit-perfect volume control
plugins.author: Volumio Team

plugins.name: fritzcallmute
plugins.description: Mutes on phone calls via FritzBox router
plugins.details: The germany polular router FritzBox has a build in callmonitor. This plugin pauses playing if callmonitor signals an incoming call. After hangup playing is resumed.
plugins.author: clmtrapp

plugins.name: ampswitch
plugins.description: Status based power management of external amplifier
plugins.details: This plugin allows the control of a power amplifier via GPIOs, to turn it on and off based on Volumio playback status
plugins.author: Tim Lange

plugins.name: lastfm
plugins.description: (Installs a LastFM scrobbler which uses the Volumio artist and
plugins.details: This plugin enables lastFM scrobbling
plugins.author: Saiyato

plugins.name: kodi
plugins.description: Installs Kodi Krypton on top of Volumio.
plugins.author: Saiyato

plugins.name: remotepi
plugins.description: The plugin enables support for the RemotePi board.
plugins.author: gvolt

plugins.name: autostart
plugins.description: This plugin starts the first entry in the queue or from the last played position after rebooting volumio.
plugins.author: Thomas Doerr

plugins.name: onkyo_control
plugins.description: Turn Onkyo amplifier on the network on and off when playback begins and ends
plugins.author: Ben Mitchell

plugins.name: auto_play
plugins.description: Autoplay plugin - Enable this plugin in order to let volumio start playing the last entry in the queue after a reboot.
plugins.author: Thomas Doerr

plugins.name: nanosound
plugins.description: Companion plugin for NanoSound DAC
plugins.author: Nanomesher

plugins.name: snapcast
plugins.description: SnapCast integration pack
plugins.details: Add snapcast features to Volumio
plugins.author: Saiyato

plugins.name: volumio_usb_reset
plugins.description: This plugin resets all the USB device connections. Useful when Volumio behaves erratically
plugins.details: This plugin gives the ability to reset the entire USB chain connected to the Volumio server. Many times I noticed that when Volumio became unresponsive, one solution was to disconnect all USB devices and reconnect them. This plugin provides a way to reset the connected USB devices and recover from an unresponsive volumio installation. Probably the problem is related to some specific DACs, I experienced the problem with a SMSL SU-8. I hope the plugin can be useful.
plugins.author: Alfonso

plugins.name: gpio-buttons
plugins.description: GPIO button-listener plugin for Volumio2
plugins.details:
GPIO Buttons


Control basic playback functions by connecting buttons to Raspberry Pi GPIOs
Features:
  • Play/pause
  • Next/previous
  • Volume +/-
  • Shutdown

Click here for infos and wiring instructions
plugins.author: tomatpasser

plugins.name: backup_restore
plugins.description: This plugin allows User to locally backup volumio data (playlists, settings, etc) and restore later
plugins.details:
Backup & Restore Plugin


Locally back-up and restore Volumio data

Choose which sets of data you want to archive (queue, playlist, Favourites, Configuration, Album Art), and hit backup button:
Generated archive file will then be available from Volumio SMB share.
That file may be copied & put-back in similar location on another (or re-imaged) device for restore.
plugins.author: macmpi

plugins.name: audiophonicsonoff
plugins.description: Minimized Audiophonics plugin for button management, copied from RaspDac by Jedail
plugins.details: RPI power management for Audiophonics board
plugins.author: Saiyato

plugins.name: gpio_control
plugins.description: GPIO output control plugin for Volumio
plugins.details: GPIO control can react to Volumio events and control GPIO
plugins.author: supercrab

plugins.name: ir_controller
plugins.description: Volumio IR Remote plugin
plugins.details:
IR Remote Controller Plugin


This Plugin has been sponsored by JustBoom and it works out of the box with JustBoom IR Remote

FEATURES:

  • 3 profiles available (JustBoom IR Remote, Odroid Remote, Apple remote)
  • Controls: Play, pause, mute, volume, next, previous, seek, repeat and random
plugins.author: Volumio Team

plugins.name: 503_hta_tube_amp
plugins.description: This plugin allows to use GPIO functionalities of the PI2 Design 503hta Tube AMP-DAC
plugins.details:
PI2 Design 503hta Tube AMP-DAC


This plugin allows to use GPIO functionalities of the 503hta Tube AMP-DAC

  • Shutdown
  • High Frequency Rolloff Filter
